title: 1password is called 10 times - should be cached/called once
Spinner to checkmark transition causes visual jump to the right
description: When a service completes, the spinner (⠋) changes to a checkmark (✓), but the checkmark appears shifted to the right compared to the spinner position. This creates a visual 'jump' effect. The checkmark and spinner should be aligned.
